Posts.Content: I was dx with TNBC in October 2007, I have completed chemo, surgery and radiation.  I just recently had my 3rd PET Scan that shows a Hot spot in the same breast.  My Onicologist sent me to my surgeon and my surgeon has told me to get a MRI and then return to him.  I have schedule an appointment with another surgeon to get a 2nd opt.  is this wrong of me?
Posts.Title: TNBC
